definitions.body: :Mic 1:4 vale (prop. deepening, depth, v. GASm:Geogr. 384 f. 654 f.; cf. [[בִּקְעָה]], [[גַּיְא]], [[נַחַל]]);—´[[י]] abs. Jos 8:13 +, cstr. Ge 14:17 +; sf. [[עִמְקֵח]] Je 49:4, [[עִמְקָם]] Je 47:5 (but v. infr.); pl. [[עֲמָקִים]] Mic 1:4, sf. [[עֲמָקַיִח]] Is 22:7; —vale, valley, lowland, opp. [[הֶהָרִים]] Mic 1:4, amid mts., e.g. about Jerus. Is 22:7, Je 31:40, so perh. [[לשׁוֵה]] ´[[ע]] Ge 14:17 = [[הַמֶּלֶח]] ´[[ע]] v:Ge 14:17, 2Sa 18:18, cf. [[תֶבְרוֹן]] ´[[ע]] Ge 37:14 (J), [[בְּגִבְעוֹן]] ´[[ע]] Is 28:21, Jos 8:13 (JE), [[הָאֵלָה]] ´[[ע]] 1Sa 17:2, 1Sa 17:19, 1Sa 21:10 (perh. Wady es-Sant, in Shephelah, W. of Bethlehem, GASm:Geogr. 226); [[אֲשֶׁר לְבֵית רְחוֹב]] ´[[ע]] Ju Jdg 18:28 in extreme north; in Moab Je 48:8 (‖ [opp.?] [[מִישׁוֹר]]); or wider, e.g. Ju Jdg 5:15 (scene of Sisera's defeat; rd. perh. ´[[ע]] also for [[עֲמָלֵק]] v:Jdg 5:14 GFM), [[יִזְרְעֶָאל]] ´[[ע]] Ju Jdg 6:33, Ho 1:5, Jos 17:16 (JE), cf. Ju Jdg 7:1, Jdg 7:8, Jdg 7:12, 1Sa 31:7 = 1Ch 10:7, these all perh. narrow ends of plain (cf. GASm:l.c.), but v. 1Ki 20:28 (opp. [[הֶהָרִים]]; ‖[[מִישׁוֹר]] v:1Ki 20:23; = open country, cf. Aphek v:1Ki 20:26); of Jordan-valley Jos 13:19, Jos 13:27 (P); of maritime plain (opp. [[הָהָר]]) Ju Jdg 1:19, Jdg 1:34; fit for chariots, so also [[אֶרֶץ]] ´[[הָע]] Jos 17:16 (P), cf. Job 39:21; ´[[ישֶׁבֶת הָע]] Je 21:13, cf. Nu 14:25 (v. Gie di); cultivated 1Sa 6:13, Je 49:4, Je 49:4, Job 39:10, fertile 1Ch 27:29, Ps 65:14, Ct So 2:1; v. also [[אַיׇּלוֹן]], [[בָּכָא]], [[כְּרָכָה]], II. [[חָרוּץ]], [[יְהוֹשָׁפָט]], [[סֻכּוֹת]], [[עָכוֹר]], [[קְחִיץ]], [[רְפָאִים]], [[שִׂדִּים]]; ´[[בֵּית הָע]] v. p. 112 a.—For [[עִמְקָם]] Je 47:5 rd. [[עֲנׇקִם]] Anakim LXX Thes Hi Gf Gie Co Rothst; so also (more dub.) 1Ch 12:16 (van d. H. v:15) Gf Gie, where otherwise ´[[הָע]] = people of valleys.
